bibl.title: Grain Funds in the Roman Near East: Market Failure or Murder of the Market?
bibl.note: Commente et complète les réflexions de: Paul Erdkamp, The Grain Market in the Roman Empire. A Social, Political and Economic Study (Cambridge, 2005).
